name: YogaGuru
0:
”Alexa, ask Yoga Guru to teach me a yoga pose”
”Alexa, ask Yoga Guru for a yoga pose”
”Alexa, ask Yoga Guru to teach me a yoga posture”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yoga guru
des: Yoga is an ancient art of maintaining one's fitness. The skill helps in getting to know various asanas i.e., poses that one could practice to maintain health and fitness. The skill currently only has few asanas - however we've been updating the list and in the coming days users'll be able to obtain step-by-step guide to performing asanas and get interactive with Alexa within the asana context.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
